title: Anytime I log in it thinks I'm in a game, even though I'm not
body:
It attempts to load me into a game I'm "still in", but there is no such game, so it keeps giving me server errors.
It's been doing this for about an hour or two now, since my last game ended and I "skipped waiting for stats"

replies.body: We're looking into this now!  Our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page has been updated as we investigate further.  Hang tight!
